prompt: Design a dark-themed friend requests page with a deep navy background and a minimalist app bar titled 'Friend Requests' in white, featuring a back arrow on the left. Present a scrollable list of friend request cards with a dark gray background, each including a circular profile picture on the left with a subtle white border, the user's name and mutual friends count in white and light gray text, respectively, and two buttons (Accept in green and Decline in red) on the right. Use sharp edges for cards, moderate spacing, and ensure responsiveness. Display 5 sample friend requests with realistic names and mutual friend counts. Apply a modern sans-serif font and subtle hover effects on buttons.
